Represents an armour piece that may be added to a user's loadout.

A service used to manage Armour objects.

A utility service to provide binding used by the GroovyShell instance.
BaseDamageService
A service that calculates the base damage from a loadout.
BaseEvaluationContext
A utility service to provide a StandardEvaluationContext object used by the SpelExpressionParser instance.
BonusDamageService
A service that calculates the bonus (additive) damage from a loadout.

Represents a consumable modifier that adds various effects to a user's loadout.

A service used to manage Consumable objects.
ConsumableType

A calculation service to find out the damage output of a loadout.
DamageType
 
Enemy
Represents the enemy or target.
Environment
Represents an environment and its details such as time of day.
EnvironmentManager
A service used to manage Environment objects.
ExpressionDeserializer
A utility service used to allow a JsonParser to convert a String object into an Expression object.
FileConfig
 
GroovyScriptService
A service for handling Groovy script parsing and execution.
Loadout
Represents a storage object so that each manager is grouped to the same loadout based on LoadoutID.
LoadoutManager
A service used to manage Loadout objects.
LoadoutScope
 
LoadoutScopeClearable
 
MapUtil
A utility service used by ModifierExpressionService to create a AbstractMap.SimpleEntry.
Material
Represents a material modification that can be made to a piece of armour.
MeleeWeapon
Represents a generic melee weapon that the user can add to their loadout.
MeleeWeaponBuilder
Builder for creating instances of MeleeWeapon.
Miscellaneous
Represents a miscellaneous modification that can be made to a piece of armour.
Modifier<V>
Represents a generic modifier that can apply effects to a users loadout.
ModifierAggregationService<V>
A service that retrieves and returns all known modifiers.
ModifierBoostService<V>
A service that is used to store and apply boosts to Modifier's values.
ModifierConditionLogic
A service that is used to evaluate a Modifier's condition logic.
ModifierExpressionService
A service that is used to parse and return expressions for modifiers that require additional logic to apply a value.
ModifierExpressionsLoaderService
 
ModifierMethodLoaderService
 
ModifierMethodService
A service used to store Groovy Scripts to run dynamic methods at runtime.
ModifierSource
 
ModifierTypes
 
ModLoaderService
 
ModType
 
Mutation
Represents a mutation that a player character might have.
MutationEffects<V>
Represents a mutation modifier that adds various effects to a user's loadout.
MutationLoaderService
 
MutationManager
A service used to manage Mutation objects.
ParsingService
A service responsible for parsing and evaluating SpEL (Spring Expression Language) expressions.
Perk<V>
Represents a perk modifier that adds various effects to a user's loadout based on the current rank.
PerkLoaderService
 
PerkManager
A service used to manage Perk objects.
Player
Represents a player including the players stats (SPECIAL, HP) and state (actions).
PlayerManager
A service used to manage Player objects.
RangedMod
Represents a generic modification that can be made to a weapon.
RangedWeapon
Represents a generic ranged weapon that the user can add to their loadout.
RangedWeaponBuilder
Builder for creating instances of RangedWeapon.
Receiver
Represents a receiver modification for a ranged weapon.
ReceiverDeserializer
A utility service used to allow a JsonParser to convert the name of receiver into an Receiver object.
ReceiverType
 
ScopeConfig
 
Special
Represents a players SPECIAL stats.
SpecialBonusCalculationService

Weapon
Represents a generic weapon that the user can add to their loadout.
WeaponBuilder<T>
Builder for creating instances of Weapon.
WeaponChangedEvent
An event which is called when a change to a loadout's Weapon has been made.
